hero.name: Hosenur Jaman Jony.
hero.subtitle: I build reliable networks.
hero.desc: I am a Network Engineer specializing in designing, implementing, and securing complex network infrastructures. I make sure data flows where it needs to go, securely and efficiently.

about.text1: Hello! My name is Hosenur and I enjoy ensuring systems communicate reliably. My interest in networking started when I set up my first home lab, trying to understand how the internet actually works.
about.text2: Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working on enterprise-grade networks, securing critical infrastructure, and optimizing data flows. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive, and secure network architectures.
about.tech_intro: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

skills.details: Routing & Switching (OSPF, BGP, VLANs), MPLS, VPNs, SD-WAN
Firewall Configuration, IDS/IPS, ACLs, IPsec, VPN
AWS VPC, Azure VNet, Docker, Ansible, Terraform

certifications.title: Cloud
certifications.details: AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate

experience.title: Network Engineer
desc: Designed and implemented a redundant network architecture affecting 500+ users.
Reduced network downtime by 20% through proactive monitoring using SolarWinds.
Automated configuration backups using Python and Ansible.

experience.title: Junior Network Admin
desc: Managed daily network operations including troubleshooting connectivity issues.
Configured and maintained Cisco switches and routers.
Assisted in the migration of on-premise infrastructure to AWS.

contact.desc: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
